name: SUCC (JJ)
description:
bridges that succ, and stuff.

controller support is halfway there, thanks unity input system 2

Controls:

WASD to move
Space to jump

Left mouse to create bridge point
Right mouse to cancel bridge point
Middle mouse to make or break a jump pad

E to succ
Q to succn't
Scroll to adjust succ speed

left-click the sphere to spawn cube, right-click the sphere to kill all cubes
